title: How to beat  adcs 1v1

replies.body:
Doesn't work when ADCs can get {{summoner:1}} {{item:3140}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3046}} .

Best thing is another ADC or an AD Assassin or Fighter with {{item:3031}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3046}} .

Works for me every time.

what adc gets MR? lol 
and by the time they buy those items , teemo is already  fed

when they get those items, u will lose even if u were fed.

u didnt face someone with scaling HP + MP rune setup did u ? ... it is stupid efficient against mages once u get some levels and they just need to farm whatever they can and get {{item:3155}} which is pretty cheap then they will be able to duel u with {{summoner:1}} easily since u have only 1 damage nuke.
{{champion:31}}  no amount of micro can outplay the flash auto r w of a 0-0 130 cs by 20 chogath.
